document.full_text: cristiano ronaldo scored twice in real madrid's 8-1 rout of almeria on saturday to set a spanish league record of 40 goals in a single season.
document.title: ronaldo's 40th goal sets spanish league record
lines_and_colors: cristiano ronaldo scored twice in real madrid's 8-1 rout of almeria on saturday to set a spanish league record of 40 goals in a single season.
